# This file was automagically generated by mbed.org.
# If you would like to add your own targets, create a
# project.cmake file locally in your project directory.

CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 3.9)
SET(CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME Generic)
#SET(CMAKE_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR arm)
SET(CMAKE_CROSSCOMPILING TRUE)

# force compiler settings
SET(CMAKE_C_COMPILER_WORKS TRUE)
SET(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_WORKS TRUE)

SET(CMAKE_ASM_COMPILER_INIT    "arm-none-eabi-gcc")
SET(CMAKE_C_COMPILER_INIT      "arm-none-eabi-gcc")
SET(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_INIT    "arm-none-eabi-g++")
SET(ELF2BIN                    "arm-none-eabi-objcopy")


# here starts the project
PROJECT(cmake-ubirch-mbed-crypto C CXX ASM)
#SET(CMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE ON)

SET(LD_SYS_LIBS "-Wl,--start-group -lstdc++ -lsupc++ -lm -lc -lgcc -lnosys  -Wl,--end-group")

SET(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "-std=gnu99 -Wall -Wextra -Wno-unused-parameter -Wno-missing-field-initializers -fmessage-length=0 -fno-exceptions -fno-builtin -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -funsigned-char -MMD -fno-delete-null-pointer-checks -fomit-frame-pointer -O0 -g3 -DMBED_DEBUG -DMBED_TRAP_ERRORS_ENABLED=1 -mcpu=cortex-m4 -mthumb -mfpu=fpv4-sp-d16 -mfloat-abi=softfp -include mbed_config.h")
SET(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "-std=gnu++98 -fno-rtti -Wvla -Wall -Wextra -Wno-unused-parameter -Wno-missing-field-initializers -fmessage-length=0 -fno-exceptions -fno-builtin -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -funsigned-char -MMD -fno-delete-null-pointer-checks -fomit-frame-pointer -O0 -g3 -DMBED_DEBUG -DMBED_TRAP_ERRORS_ENABLED=1 -mcpu=cortex-m4 -mthumb -mfpu=fpv4-sp-d16 -mfloat-abi=softfp  -include mbed_config.h")
SET(CMAKE_ASM_FLAGS "-x assembler-with-cpp -Wall -Wextra -Wno-unused-parameter -Wno-missing-field-initializers -fmessage-length=0 -fno-exceptions -fno-builtin -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -funsigned-char -MMD -fno-delete-null-pointer-checks -fomit-frame-pointer -O0 -g3 -DMBED_DEBUG -DMBED_TRAP_ERRORS_ENABLED=1 -mcpu=cortex-m4 -mthumb -mfpu=fpv4-sp-d16 -mfloat-abi=softfp  -include mbed_config.h")
SET(CMAKE_CXX_LINK_FLAGS "-Wl,--gc-sections -Wl,--wrap,main -Wl,--wrap,__malloc_r -Wl,--wrap,__free_r -Wl,--wrap,__realloc_r -Wl,--wrap,__memalign_r -Wl,--wrap,__calloc_r -Wl,--wrap,exit -Wl,--wrap,atexit -Wl,-n -mcpu=cortex-m4 -mthumb -mfpu=fpv4-sp-d16 -mfloat-abi=softfp")
SET(CMAKE_CXX_LINK_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_LINK_FLAGS} ${LD_SYS_LIBS} -T ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/ubirch-mbed-crypto.link_script.ld")

  ./mbed-os/rtos/TARGET_CORTEX/rtx5/RTX/Source/TOOLCHAIN_GCC/TARGET_RTOS_M4_M7/irq_cm4f.S
  ./mbed-os/rtos/TARGET_CORTEX/rtx5/RTX/Source/rt_OsEventObserver.c
  ./mbed-os/rtos/TARGET_CORTEX/rtx5/RTX/Source/rt_OsEventObserver.h
  ./mbed-os/rtos/TARGET_CORTEX/rtx5/RTX/Source/rtx_core_c.h
  ./mbed-os/rtos/TARGET_CORTEX/rtx5/RTX/Source/rtx_core_ca.h

  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/TARGET_K82F/drivers/fsl_smc.h
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/TARGET_K82F/drivers/fsl_tpm.c
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/TARGET_K82F/drivers/fsl_tpm.h
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/TARGET_K82F/drivers/fsl_trng.c
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/TARGET_K82F/drivers/fsl_trng.h
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/TARGET_K82F/drivers/fsl_tsi_v4.c
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/TARGET_K82F/drivers/fsl_tsi_v4.h
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/TARGET_K82F/drivers/fsl_vref.c
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/TARGET_K82F/drivers/fsl_vref.h
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/TARGET_K82F/drivers/fsl_wdog.c
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/TARGET_K82F/drivers/fsl_wdog.h
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/TARGET_K82F/peripheral_clock_defines.h
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/TARGET_K82F/pwmout_api.c
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/TARGET_K82F/serial_api.c
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/TARGET_K82F/spi_api.c
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/TARGET_K82F/trng_api.c
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/TARGET_K82F/us_ticker.c
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/api/PeripheralPins.h
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/api/PortNames.h
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/api/analogin_api.c
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/api/analogout_api.c
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/api/dma_api.c
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/api/dma_api_hal.h
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/api/flash_api.c
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/api/gpio_api.c
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/api/gpio_irq_api.c
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/api/gpio_object.h
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/api/i2c_api.c
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/api/lp_ticker.c
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/api/objects.h
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/api/pinmap.c
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/api/port_api.c
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/api/rtc_api.c
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/api/sleep.c
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/fsl_common.c
  ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/mbed_rtx.h
  )


# executable ubirch-mbed-crypto
ADD_EXECUTABLE(ubirch-mbed-crypto
  ./mbed_config.h
  ./source/Base64.cpp
  ./source/Base64.h
  ./source/KeyPair.cpp
  ./source/KeyPair.h
  ./source/ubirchCrypto.cpp
  ./source/ubirchCrypto.h
  )
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(ubirch-mbed-crypto PROPERTIES ENABLE_EXPORTS 1)
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ubirch-mbed-crypto
  ubirch-mbed-nacl-cm0
  mbed-os
  )

add_custom_command(TARGET ubirch-mbed-crypto PRE_LINK
                   COMMAND "arm-none-eabi-cpp" -E -P -Wl,--gc-sections -Wl,--wrap,main -Wl,--wrap,_malloc_r -Wl,--wrap,_free_r -Wl,--wrap,_realloc_r -Wl,--wrap,_memalign_r -Wl,--wrap,_calloc_r -Wl,--wrap,exit -Wl,--wrap,atexit -Wl,-n -mcpu=cortex-m4 -mthumb -mfpu=fpv4-sp-d16 -mfloat-abi=softfp ./mbed-os/targets/TARGET_Freescale/TARGET_MCUXpresso_MCUS/TARGET_K82F/device/TOOLCHAIN_GCC_ARM/MK82FN256xxx15.ld -o ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/ubirch-mbed-crypto.link_script.ld
                   WORKING_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
                   BYPRODUCTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/ubirch-mbed-crypto.link_script.ld"
                   )

add_custom_command(TARGET ubirch-mbed-crypto POST_BUILD
                   COMMAND ${ELF2BIN} -O ihex $<TARGET_FILE:ubirch-mbed-crypto> $<TARGET_FILE:ubirch-mbed-crypto>.hex
                  )


##########################################################################
# mbed-cli specific targets
##########################################################################

# detect the build type and select the corresponding cli profile
SET(MBED_BUILD_PROFILE "")
STRING(TOLOWER ${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE} LOWERCASE_CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE)
IF(LOWERCASE_CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES debug)
    SET(MBED_BUILD_PROFILE "mbed-os/tools/profiles/debug.json")
ELSEIF(LOWERCASE_CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES relwithdebinfo)
    SET(MBED_BUILD_PROFILE "mbed-os/tools/profiles/develop.json")
ELSEIF(LOWERCASE_CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES release)
    SET(MBED_BUILD_PROFILE "mbed-os/tools/profiles/release.json")
ELSEIF(LOWERCASE_CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES minsizerel)
    SET(MBED_BUILD_PROFILE "mbed-os/tools/profiles/release.json")
ELSE()
  MESSAGE(WARNING "Build type '${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE}' is unknown, using debug profile")
  SET(MBED_BUILD_PROFILE "mbed-os/tools/profiles/debug.json")
ENDIF()

# optional custom target to build via mbed-cli
ADD_CUSTOM_TARGET(mbed-cli-build
        COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E echo "mbed compile --build BUILD/${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE} --profile ${MBED_BUILD_PROFILE}"
        COMMAND mbed compile --build BUILD/${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE} --profile ${MBED_BUILD_PROFILE}
        WORKING_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
        SOURCES ${SOURCE_FILES} ${SYS_SOURCE_FILES})

IF(EXISTS ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/project.cmake)
  INCLUDE(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/project.cmake)
ELSE()
  MESSAGE(STATUS "Add a local project.cmake file to add your own targets.")
ENDIF()
